history.narrative: Law 4-102, the “District of Columbia Workers’ Compensation Act of 1979 Amendments Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-314, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 9, 1982, and February 23, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 26, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-161 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
